Requirements You are wielding a shield.

You can empower your defensive magic by channeling it through a physical shield. If your next action is to cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shield] cantrip, you use your shield as a locus to cast the spell, raising a magical barrier in the form of a large force projection of your worn shield. You can choose for an adjacent ally to gain the benefits of the shield spell instead of yourself. If the ally would take damage from a physical attack while protected by your shield cantrip, you can use your reaction to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Shield Block] with the spell on their behalf.

value.value: you can cast the shield cantrip
